description: Returns a list of destinations that you have created to receive RUM extended metrics, for the specified app monitor. For more information about extended metrics, see AddRumMetrics.

parameters.name: AppMonitorName
parameters.description: The name of the app monitor associated with the destinations that you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return in one operation. The default is 50. The maximum that you can specify is 100. To retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned NextToken value.

nested_items.name: Destinations
nested_items.description: The list of CloudWatch RUM extended metrics destinations associated with the app monitor that you specified.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the destination is CloudWatch or Evidently.

nested_items.name: DestinationArn
nested_items.description: If the destination is Evidently, this specifies the ARN of the Evidently experiment that receives the metrics.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: This field appears only when the destination is Evidently. It specifies the ARN of the IAM role that is used to write to the Evidently experiment that receives the metrics.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that you can use in a subsequent operation to retrieve the next set of results.
